mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INTERVIEW (INTERVIEW_ID, MEMBER_ID, QUESTION, SECTOR, CAREER, GENDER) VALUES (INTERVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{question}, #{sector}, #{career}, #{gender})
mapper.update: UPDATE INTERVIEW SET ANSWER = #{answer}, SUGGEST = #{suggest}, EMOTION = #{emotion}, INTENTION = #{intention}, GRADE = #{grade} WHERE INTERVIEW_ID = ( SELECT INTERVIEW_ID FROM ( SELECT INTERVIEW_ID FROM INTERVIEW WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY INTERVIEW_ID DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT QUESTION, ANSWER, EMOTION, INTENTION, SUGGEST, SECTOR, CREATED_DATE FROM INTERVIEW WHERE ANSWER IS NOT NULL ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT QUESTION, ANSWER, EMOTION, INTENTION, SUGGEST, SECTOR, GRADE, CREATED_DATE FROM INTERVIEW WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND ANSWER IS NOT NULL ORDER BY CREATED_DATE DESC
